  • Method Details

    • meterNumber

      protected int meterNumber()
      Get the meter number of the device.
      Returns:
      Meter number (1 or 2) or 0 if unassigned.

    • meterAddress

      protected int meterAddress(int off)
      Get memory address for ramp meter data.
      Parameters:
      off - Controller address offset.
      Returns:
      Controller memory address for meter data.

    • tableAddress

      protected int tableAddress()
      Get memory address of the meter timing table.
      Returns:
      Controller memory address of meter timing table.

    • redAddress

      protected int redAddress(int rate)
      Get memory address of a red time in the current timing table.
      Parameters:
      rate - Meter rate index (1-6).
      Returns:
      Controller memory address of red time interval.
